charges.charge_disposition: Deft Shall Pay A Special Assessment in The Amount of $ 100.00 And The Deft is Hereby Committed to The Custody of The US Bureau of Prisons to be Imprisoned For A Term of 188 Months And Upon Release From Imprisonment The Deft Shall be on Supervise D Release For A Term of 3 Years With Standard Conditions of Supervision And Restitution in This Matter is Mandatory. in Order to Meet Defts Restitution Obligation, The Court Has The Understanding That Deft Has Established And Fully Funded A Trust Acc Ount in The Amount of $ 200,000.00 For The Benefit of The Child Victum in This Case And The Deft is Ordered to Forfeit The Following Property to The United States, Dell Laptop Computer, Gateway 2000 Tower, Nec Laptop Versa Model, Scanner, Syques T Drive, Olympus Digital Camera, And Olympus Digital Camera, no Fine.
Dismissed on Motion of The United States
